title: Stock price of Goldman Sachs 2004 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Stock price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 16 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2007 to 2004.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2007.
gold: The stock price of Goldman Sachs was 229.93 points at the close of 2019 . This is down from its height in 2018 , but still well above the slumps in 2008 and 2011 due to the Financial Crisis and its aftermath . What does the stock price depend on ? The stock price is how much it costs to buy one share of Goldman Sachs .
